text:
DocSend | San Francisco | ONSITE | Full-time

Hello SF! We're looking for Senior Full Stack Engineers to help us grow and scale. We're the top rated product in our space, top product = top level engineering.

Ownership in code and product development - Interesting and new problems - Collaborative team - Award-winning culture

Stack: Rails, JS/CoffeeScript/JQuery, PostGres, Heroku

More info here: https://jobs.lever.co/docsend/ebc75d63-fc3c-4329-aa30-975986...

Hope to meet you soon!
